int ofc_proc_sgml ( LibofxContext *  libofx_context,
int  argc,
char *  argv[] 
)

Parses a DTD and OFX file(s).

ofc_proc_sgml will take a list of files in command line format. The first file must be the DTD, and then any number of OFX files.
